channel.title: Help with running a server!
channel.description:
Hello,
I have been trying to make a server. I got to the part where you run it. I have 1 error.
Error 1: When i click run server it says "Java is not known as an internal or external command"... Please help!
Also, if you know of a good source i can run on mopar, just a basic server source, please tell me the source.
Thanks so much! :)

item.title: Help with running a server!
item.dc:creator: @Lawl_Rox Lawl Rox
item.description:
@Lawl_Rox wrote:

Hello,

I have been trying to make a server. I got to the part where you run it. I have 1 error.

Error 1: When i click run server it says “Java is not known as an internal or external command”… Please help!
